meanings: a borrowed barley bag, a cat in a strange garret

vlive.korean: 근데 또 기억에 남았던 무대가 '꿈을 꾼다'? And another one was "DREAM FOR YOU". 듣기 View video V PICK! : [KIM MIN KYU] 퐁실퐁실 구름에 올려두고 하루에 312억번 칭찬이랑 하트만 주고 싶은 천사가 여기있어요💕 (KIM MIN KYU’s Q&A time)
vlive.english: And another one was "DREAM FOR YOU".

vlive.korean: 꾼 다 됐어~ - 근데 진짜 다 리얼 정글이었어요. He's gotten so good. - But it was really a jungle. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [Replay] THE BOYZ COMEBACK SHOWCASE ‘ONE & ONLY’
vlive.english: He's gotten so good. - But it was really a jungle.

vlive.korean: 꿈을 의미 있게 꾼다. he dreams something big. 듣기 View video BTOB : <민혁이의 멜로디가 빛나는 밤에> - 두 번째 이야기
제성 씨는 잘 될 거예요, 밤에 잠을 자면 꿈을 꾼다. You will do well. 듣기 View video 10PM : 월요일 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
’나와 함께 꿈을 꾼다'도 들으셔도 되고요. You can listen to "Dream With Me" as well. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : [치열업] 미리 해피 추석~
vlive.english: You can listen to "Dream With Me" as well.
